meanings.sent1: The nonclassified documents were left on the desk.
meanings.sent2: The nonclassified files were easy to access.
meanings.sent3: The nonclassified papers played hide and seek with the classified ones.
meanings.sent4: Her nonclassified thoughts wandered freely, unbound by rules.
meanings.sent5: The nonclassified items stood out in the organized room.

meanings.definition: Not included in a specific classification or category.
meanings.sent1: The nonclassified items were scattered around the room.
meanings.sent2: The nonclassified data was difficult to analyze.
meanings.sent3: The nonclassified snacks rebelled against the labeled shelves.
meanings.sent4: His nonclassified music collection was a mix of genres.
meanings.sent5: The nonclassified plants added a wild touch to the garden.
